rudhiramaya ganudenu ha sambandhatha gana shuddha bayibalaye wiwidha than wala sandahan wi atha.(2) anthima rathri bhojanaye di kristhus wahanse pasku aashirwaditha kusalana ragena thama shrawakayanta demin, " me kusalana oba udesa wagurawanu labana mage rudhirayen kala nawa giwisuma ya" (luk 22 : 20) yanuwen pukasha kale, dewiyan wahanse samaga karana giwisum wala di thibiya yuthu jiwithamaya bandima penwa dimataya.

premadasa kridanganayediyi.tharagaya ada rathri hathata aarambha wimata niyamithayi.derata athara pawathi palamu wissayi wissa tharagaya kadulu 6 kin jayaganimata shri lanka kandayama samathwuna.me athara ada tharangaya shri lanka kandayama jayagrahanaya kirimata samathwuwahoth pita pitama wissayi wissa tharagawali jayagrahana thrithwayak hewath 'hattrik ' jayak wartha karanu labayi.ee mita pera dakunu aprikawata saha ostreliyawata erehiwa pawathi wissayi wissa tharagawali dekama 2 ta 1 lesa jayagrahana shri lanka kandayama himikaraganima hethuwen.me athara bangladesha nayaka mortasage awasan wissayi wissa jathyanthara tharagayada ada tharangayayi.ohu palamu tharangayen pasuwa dewana tharangaya pilibandawa adahas dakwamin prakasha kale mewannak.''wissayi wissa gahanna godak sharirika saukhya thiyenna oona.

rogaya suwawu pasu,adala katayuthu wala yediya haki wimata awashya prathikara labadennak men akusalayen kramayen sitha mudawa niwaradi bawata pathkarawana, sitha pirisudu karana, sila wishuddhi, chiththa wishuddhi, ditti wishuddhi kankhawitharana wishuddhi , maggamagga chana dassana wishuddhi, patipada gnyanadassana wishuddhi gnyana dassana wishuddhi lesa kramanukulawa prabala akusalaye sita siyum wu akusalaya dakwama sithehi hata ganima walakana, nathi nuwanasa athi karana, nathi gnyanaya , athikarana, sitha samahitha karana, wishesha gnyanayak athi karana, maganuwana athikarawana, keles nupadina thathwayata pathkarawana,aarya ashtangika margayama, sitha suwapath karawana margayama, bauddha mano chikithsawayi.

habayi ee kale diha baluwama pithikaruwo pidanayata path karala tharanga dinawapu pandu yawannek widiyata kodew pile sunil narayan mata handunwanna puluwan.ohuta puluwan wuna anthima panduwarath honda palanayak ekka yomu karanna, ee eka pandu yawannek mama dakapu,habayi mama ahapu prashnayata pilithura widiyata denne pahugiya awurudu dahaye pahalowe pithikaruwan wadathma pidanayata path karala tharanga wadima pramanayak dinawapu pandu yawanna thamayi lasith malinga.mama hithanne na,ohu tharam hondata awasana panduwara kipaya pidanayath ekka yawanna puluwan pandu yawannek pahugiya kale bihiwuna kiyala,malinga thamayi mage therima.
